mapper.select: select ch.channel_id, ch.channel_name, ch.username, ch.remark, DATE_FORMAT(ch.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time from t_channel ch where 1=1 and ch.`status`=true and ch.channel_id=#{channelId}

select ch.channel_id, ch.channel_name, ch.username, ch.remark, GROUP_CONCAT(r.role_name order by r.update_time) roleNames, DATE_FORMAT(ch.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time from t_channel ch left join t_auth_admin_role ar on ar.admin_id=ch.channel_id left join t_auth_role r on r.`status`=true and r.role_id=ar.role_id where 1=1 and ch.`status`=true
and (ch.channel_id like CONCAT('%',#{channel},'%') or ch.channel_name like CONCAT('%',#{channel},'%'))
and DATE_FORMAT(ch.create_time,'%Y%m%d')>=DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y%m%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(ch.create_time,'%Y%m%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y%m%d')
and ch.remark like CONCAT('%',#{remark},'%')
group by ch.channel_id order by ch.update_time desc
